channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Gaudy, Nasty Fictions of Donald J. Trump
item.description: This is neither law nor order, and the consequences can be deadly.

item.title: Russia Knocks Out the Heat in Ukraine
item.description: The Kremlin has tried for years to freeze Ukraine into submission. This winter, its attacks have been the most devastating ever.
